repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:latest

RUN apk update && \
    apk add --no-cache bash postgresql-client mysql-client sqlite && \
    apk add --no-cache --update openssl

ADD shmig /bin/shmig

## SHMIG configuration
ENV TYPE=mysql \
    HOST=localhost \
    PORT=3389 \
    DATABASE=db \
    LOGIN=root \
    PASSWORD=root \
    ASK_PASSWORD=0 \
    MIGRATIONS=/sql \
    MYSQL=/usr/bin/mysql \
    PSQL=/usr/bin/psql \
    SQLITE3=/usr/bin/sqlite3 \
    UP_MARK="====  UP  ====" \
    DOWN_MARK="==== DOWN ====" \
    COLOR=auto \
    SCHEMA_TABLE=shmig_version

ADD entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
